ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/HelloWorld.xcworkspace -scheme HelloWorld -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 8

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/HelloWorld.xcworkspace -scheme HelloWorld -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 8
